FuncDef: This command configures the remaining length of time in seconds that this prefix will continue to be preferred, such as, time until deprecation. The address generated from a deprecated prefix should not be used as a source address in new communications, but packets received on such an interface are processed as expected.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the remaining length of time in seconds that this prefix will continue to be preferred.
Specifies that the prefix will always be preferred. A value of 4,294,967,295 represents infinity.
